alert.note: Alert for Habersham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 12:23PM EST until February 05 at 2:24AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive runoff continues. * WHERE...Portions of Habersham and Rabun counties. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EST. * IMPACTS...River and streamflows remain elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1220 PM EST, Lingering flooding of low-lying areas along larger drainages such as the Chattooga, Tallulah and Soque Rivers will continue all afternoon. - Some locations that may experience lingering flooding include... Clarkesville, Cornelia, Baldwin, Demorest, Mount Airy, Tallulah Falls, Lake Rabun, Lakemont, Tallulah Gorge State Park, Lake Burton, Hollywood, Turnerville and Seed Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
